messages.subject: Re:Re:Re: How do you do it?
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, I think the short answer, to the person who asked the questions about unschooling and was bummed out by the response she received is this: If you are
messages.messageBody:
Hi,

I think the short answer, to the person who asked the questions about
unschooling and was bummed out by the response she received is this: If you are
always learning and model that for your child, he or she will always be learning as
well.

Diane


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
